verses.verse: More about Jesus I would know, More of His grace to others show; More of His saving fullness see, More of His love who died for me.
verses.refrain: More, more about Jesus, More, more about Jesusl; More of His saving fullness see, More of His love who died for me.
verses.verse: More about Jesus let me learn, More of His holy will discern; Spirit of God, my teacher be, Showing the things of Christ to me.
More about Jesus; in His word, Holding commuion with my Lord, Hearing His voice in every line, Making each faithful saying mine.
